programme.desc: They live in a tropical paradise - a tranquil community set in picture perfect crystal clear waters and blue skies - far from the mire and corrupting distractions of urban life. There is now a meagre supply of fish and there are new needs with the encroachment of modernity.

programme.desc: (R) The textiles we use daily are made from textile fibres. Do you know the clothes you wear are made from natural or man-made fibres? Lee Teng is at the 100 year-old ranch and wool mill in Australia to introduce the natural wool fibre and in Thailand to take a look at the production of man-made fibres. (重)生活中使用的纺织品，是由纺织纤维所制成。你知道你身上穿的衣服，是由天然纤维，还是人造纤维纺织而成的？李腾将飞往澳州百年牧场及羊毛纺织厂，为观众介绍天然羊毛纤维。他也会前往泰国，见识人造纤维的生产过程。.

programme.title: 开门见餐 Home Dining - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Karen Ng had worked as a home cook for Canadian High Commissioner for 10 years. Since then, she has been hosting dinner for her friends and relatives at home. What would she prepare for the guests tonight? Menu includes Prawn Chicken Cup, Scotch Egg, Pakistani Spicy Chicken Rice, Pan-fried Fish Fillet with Salsa and etc. Sounds interesting? How do they taste like? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)黄碧燕曾担任三届加拿大驻本地大使的私人厨师长达10年。离开大使馆加入保险行业之前，她就已经常在家设宴款待朋友，之后也因厨艺深获好评而开始为友人的家宴当厨师，至今超过15年。她今天为宾客精心烹调的料理，包括了鲜虾鸡丁沙拉、苏格兰蛋、巴基斯坦辣香鸡和香煎多利鱼等。想知道滋味如何，欢迎你一起来“开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 10
programme.desc: Our final mission is to deliver PIANOS! Besides being bulky, their delicate structure also poses a huge challenge for delivery. (最后一集)音乐家能弹出一首首优美的旋律，除了靠天赋，还要具备好钢琴。这次的极件任务就是要运送钢琴！钢琴体积大，结构精细复杂，要怎么搬运它呢？抵达买主之后，还要提供哪些服务？对钢琴只懂皮毛的特派员葛凡是否能胜任呢？.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 12
programme.desc: Wei Wuxian sneaked into the Xuanwu demon turtle's shell, found its weakness and launched an attack to force it to leave the turtle shell. Wei Wuxian and Lan Zhan teamed up to kill the demon turtle. (PG-部分画面令人不安)魏无羡潜入妖兽玄武的龟壳之中，找它的弱点，展开攻击，逼迫它离开龟壳。两人联手杀了妖兽玄武。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Loan sharks showed up at Yue Xiang Lou demanding payment from Liang Ge, destroying tables and chairs. Wen Guang injured himself trying to save Na La, Liang Ge felt immensely guilty. Na La took the opportunity to ask Liang Ge to name the culprit that got Liang Gui addicted to gambling and ended up with a huge debt then. Liang Ge was about to reveal when Tian Hua approaches... (PG)(重)大耳窿和手下到《粤香楼》向亮哥讨债，还大肆破坏茶楼，推倒桌椅。文广为救娜拉而受伤，亮哥非常内疚。娜拉趁机问亮哥当年是谁陷害梁贵染上赌瘾，害他欠下巨债的。梁哥正要说出此人身份时，却见天华迎面而来……。.

programme.title: 节庆。风味 A Taste of Festival - EP 3
programme.desc: This episode, host introduces the characteristics of Cantonese & Peranakan CNY dishes, learns to make Roasted Chicken Stuffed with Prawns and Chef Benson demos on cooking Pork Knuckles with Red Fermented Bean Curd. Cooking methods of Nonya CNY dishes - Ayam Buah Keluak & Itek Sioh are also featured. 在这一集节目里，主持人将介绍广东和土生华人的年菜特色，例如功夫菜金龙百花鸡的做法，也请来厨师唐本陞示范烹煮南乳猪手。土生华人的年菜极富辛香酸辣的特色，节目将分享娘惹年菜如黑果焖鸡和酸甜卤鸭的烹调方法。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 1
programme.desc: Zi Le was diagnosed with Tourette's syndrome since childhood. Adopted by An Qi and Da Wei, Zi Le has been helping An Qi to bake pastries. While delivering pastries for Chinese New Year, Zi Le accidentally bumps into a lady, causing his illness to act up. A video of this incident was posted online and seen by Yu Wen who suspects that Zi Le is her childhood friend. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)子乐从小患有妥瑞氏症，从小被安琪和达威收养，帮安琪烘焙糕点。子乐送新年糕饼时，因不小心撞到妇女而病情发作，被人拍下放上网。雨汶见到，怀疑子乐是自己小时候的朋友……。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 13
programme.desc: Wen Chao reported that Xuanwu was dead, and the weapon used to suppress the turtle was lost. Furious, Wen Ruohan ordered Wen Chao to find the weapon and obliterate Lotus Cove. (PG-些许暴力画面)温晁向温若寒汇报玄武已死，镇压妖兽的武器不翼而飞。温若寒大发雷霆，责令温晁找出镇压之物，屠杀莲花坞。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 Say It ! - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) What happens when Vivian Lai speaks English and Chua Enlai speaks Mandarin? Get ready for a load of laughter today as Vivian and Enlai sets up shop in a fashion bazaar and dry goods store respectively! (重)当赖怡伶说英语，蔡恩来又说华语时，会发生什么笑料呢？这一集的《好好说 慢慢讲》的挑战地点是艺术市集和干货市场！怡伶和蔡恩能顺利完成挑战吗？.

When the three of them had dinner together, Tian Hua lamented that it took 21 years of waiting for the three of them to finally have the chance to sit down for a meal together. (PG)(重)文广出院回家，凤珠见天华家一片凌乱，决定留下来暂住，以照顾父子俩。天华以陆露和小芳不在家，不方便为由拒绝，但听说凤珠会炖汤给他们吃，顿时难以抗拒，答应下来。三人一起吃晚餐，天华感叹他等了21年，一家三口才终于可以一起吃饭。.

(PG)(第20集上)公司传出贝儿每日有型男接送，围家口中说没事，当看见二人双双出现，心里不是滋味。以爱收到立安短讯，表示情人节有空相见，怎料立安妻Daphne家有白事，要他立即飞往新加坡。.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses terms like Nonya, Ma Zu Gong Hou (another name for Amoy St), Chi Si Mao (taking the blame), and several words that mean to boast. 《新语研究所2》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么被冤枉俗称吃死猫？为什么吹嘘也叫做吹牛、车大炮或仙？娘惹的词源是什么？妈祖宫后在哪里？.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 2
programme.desc: When Zi Le delivers food to Yu Wen's house, Yu Wen's father, Hao Xiang, is unhappy about his delivery speed and wants to lodge a complaint. Zi Le tries to explain, but hastily overturns Hao Xiang's food instead. Yu Wen steps in to understand the situation upon noticing that her father is arguing with someone. Zi Le accidentally knocks down Yu Wen as he is just about to leave. (PG)子乐送外卖来到雨汶家，其父浩翔因心情不佳，不满子乐送餐太慢，称要去投诉他。子乐急于解释，却打翻了浩翔的食物。雨汶见父亲与人起争执，上前了解状况，子乐刚好要骑电板车离开，不小心撞倒雨汶……。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) In the last episode, the apprentices will be learning the traditional making of Tau Sar Piah. The grandson of Mr Lee Fanlong (90) persists to use the old way of making and bakes it with the traditional-styled oven to bring out the flaky, crisp and buttery texture of this pastry. The skills and spirit must be passed on. (重)（最后一集)锁住味道，最后一集要锁的是潮汕、台湾及本地常见的豆沙饼。简单的原料，加上纯熟的手艺，世代相传，大家吃到的，不止是一种来自家乡的口味，也是一种香浓亲切的情怀。新鲜出炉的豆沙饼，一粒粒色泽迷人，散发着香喷喷的诱人香味。这家豆沙饼老字号，目前由今年九十岁创办人李蕃龙先生的孙子，继续爷爷的坚持，用开业以来所操作的旧款煤气烤炉，天天准时烘烤富有潮州饼皮特色，同时具备西式奶油香气和酥脆可口的镇店之宝：豆沙饼。这个传统手工制作的秘方，坚持不能失传的老滋味，盼望着有心人前来学习这门手艺。.

programme.title: 仁心侠旅 II The Activist's Journey S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In the second series of The Activist's Journey, the host (Paige Chua) travels to places in Asia, where social issues and inequality breed. This series will focus on the long-standing problems that have been faced in Asia, such as shortage of food and drinking water, lack of basic medical care and the extreme marginalisation of weaker groups in society (women, children, special patients, and the poor). (重)第二系列的"仁心侠旅"，主持人前往亚洲各地去关注更多不平不公的社会现象。本系列将眼光锁定在亚洲长期存在的几个棘手问题-粮食和食水不足，基本医疗缺乏，以及弱势群体的极端边缘化。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) When Zi Le delivers food to Yu Wen's house, Yu Wen's father, Hao Xiang, is unhappy about his delivery speed and wants to lodge a complaint. Zi Le tries to explain, but hastily overturns Hao Xiang's food instead. Yu Wen steps in to understand the situation upon noticing that her father is arguing with someone. Zi Le accidentally knocks down Yu Wen as he is just about to leave....... (PG)(重)子乐送外卖来到雨汶家，其父浩翔因心情不佳，不满子乐送餐太慢，称要去投诉他。子乐急于解释，却打翻了浩翔的食物。雨汶见父亲与人起争执，上前了解状况，子乐刚好要骑电板车离开，不小心撞倒雨汶……。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy

programme.title: 新成龙历险记2 All New Jackie Chan Adventures Season 2 - EP 0001 & 0002
programme.desc: (R) Professor Chaos is a villain who creates capsule monsters out of children's bad habits and uses them to turn dreams into nightmares. The brave, smart and kind guardians of J-Team, Jackie, Amy and Duangduang, must stand up against Professor Chaos and his evil plan by stopping all his evil creations and protect children from the nightmares! (重)乱来教授是一名恶棍，他根据孩子的坏习惯制造胶囊怪物，用它们将梦想变成噩梦。 J-Team的杰克 ,小美和铛铛是勇敢，聪明和善良的梦境守护者。他们阻止乱来教授的邪恶创作并保护孩子免受噩梦，对抗乱来教授和他的邪恶计划！.

(PG)(重)文广出院回家，凤珠见天华家一片凌乱，决定留下来暂住，以照顾父子俩。天华以陆露和小芳不在家，不方便为由拒绝，但听说凤珠会炖汤给他们吃，顿时难以抗拒，答应下来。三人一起吃晚餐，天华感叹他等了21年，一家三口才终于可以一起吃饭。.

(重)小鸡蛋大学问继续带您深入了解鸡蛋！你会如何挑选鸡蛋：大小？外壳的颜色？市场上看到的玉米蛋、萝卜蛋等等又有什么分别？你知道怎么吃鸡蛋最有营养吗？怎么样的煮法对身体最好？虽然鸡蛋的营养非常丰富，但是哪些人不宜多吃？《小毛病大问题》为您揭晓答案！.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 3
programme.desc: Zi Le's illness acts up while delivering food and he has no choice but to get water from a customer to calm himself down. Zi Le is upset that he is being misunderstood and makes a call to the counselling centre. Yu Wen picks up the phone and recognises his voice....... (PG)子乐送餐时病情发作，情急下只好先拿顾客的水来喝，以缓解病情。不料其举动被人拍下放上网，掀起风波，网上谩骂声不断，子乐因此被开除。子乐被人误会，心情压抑，打电话到辅导中心抒发情绪，正好雨汶接电话，认出子乐的声音……。.

This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

These kids are given a chance to tie the cucumber with a string on the trellis so that the vegetable can grow straight and easy to harvest. They will also hands on to harvest the grapes from the vine. (重)黄瓜和葡萄都是属于攀藤类植物，就让心儿、林俊涛和他们的妈妈到金马伦高原学习这两种植物的生长环境。小农夫们将会把绳子绑在棚架上让黄瓜和葡萄可以攀藤生长，让农夫们容易采收。.

programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 我家是联合国 Home Of United Nations - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Pei Qi grew up in a well-to-do family. As a result of a turn of events, her parents decided to offer their services as student caretakers, and converted their bungalow into a "student hostel" for international kids. From then on, children from all over the world started to move in. These kids from different countries were initially resistant and dismissive of one another. As Pei Qi witnesses their loneliness and yearning for home, she puts herself in their shoes and finally realizes how fortunate she is. Pei Qi starts to reach out and make friends with them. Through mutual support and learning, they built a sincere friendship that transcends geographical boundaries. (重)一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 0041 & 0042

programme.title: 全民出来走走 SG Explorers - EP 4

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 13
programme.desc: In a remote part of Ladakh not even listed on Google Maps, is an unknown village in Leh that is completely devoid of electricity. The remoteness and rugged mountain terrain makes laying conventional power lines impossible. Host Paul Foster is on a special mission to deliver a micro-grid energy system to the people of this village. Carrying a fragile and unwieldy solar panel for days up the unforgiving terrain is a challenge that even the super fit Paul will struggle with. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 6
programme.desc: There is no limit to the type of cases that a plastic surgeon has to deal with - from aesthetic requests to birth defects, and sometimes - even trauma patients. In this episode, we follow two children born with Apert syndrome, and a man who needs urgent surgery after breaking his jaw in a bad fall. 除了应付美容需求的客户，整形外科专家姚国龙医生也得经常为先天性缺陷或创伤病患进行手术。这一集两名亚伯氏症的孩童以及一名因跌断下颌而急需进行手术的男子找上了姚医生。.

programme.title: 不凡的改变 Idea Show - EP 2
programme.desc: Hosted by Li Xiang, this creative music show employs a format of rearrangement of classic songs. In each episode, two legendary singers are invited as special guests to judge the adaptations. 全新音乐创意秀《不凡的改变》重新回归音乐创作本身，并玩起了“改编"，挑战音乐新玩法。每期节目都有两名深资歌手受邀担任特别嘉宾，并为改编歌曲作出评论。主持人：李 响.

programme.title: 梦行者 Dream Walkers - EP 5
programme.desc: Xiao Qing cannot find the courage to admit that her confession was true, bringing their relationship milestone back to square one yet again. They receive a call from Tang Ning, who claims that she has met the mysterious kidnapper.Tang Ning recounts how she was almost caught by the mysterious man, but when Xiao Qing suggests to report the case, Tang Ning refuses by saying she does not like cops. Xiao Qing cannot help but wonder whether she is pulling tricks to garner Di Lun's affection. 晓晴喝醉后向狄伦告白，可是晓晴又无法坦诚，说她只是喝醉，叫狄伦不要自作多情。过后他们接到唐凝的来电，说她又碰上神秘男了！狄伦和晓晴听唐凝说起几乎被神秘男抓走的惊险过程。晓晴提议报警，但唐凝却拒绝，说她不喜欢警察，晓晴忍不住质问唐凝，是否又是恶作剧来骗他们，目的是要博取狄伦的关心和注意。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 38
programme.desc: Ep 43: Jin Shan volunteers to stay with Jin Guanglie and pleads with Guanglie to set Huizhu free. Guanglie finally realises that he has inflicted a lot of harm on Jin Shan. Xuncai tells Zhexiong that he only regards him as a boss.Ep 44: Guanglie decides to go overseas for treatment and requests for Hengkui to take care of Huizhu and Jin Shan. Xuncai quarrels with Yingshan for her interference in his relationship with Zhen-ai. Ep 43: 金山拖着行李到金光烈的诊所，说愿意跟金光烈生活，要金光烈放过惠珠。金光烈终于意识到自己带给金山非常大的伤害。哲雄跟勋才见面。勋才表示只把哲雄当父亲看待。Ep 44: 金光烈决定到国外接受治疗，临走前拜托亨奎好好地照顾惠珠和金山。勋才如英善所愿搬回家，但因不满英善拆散他和真爱，与英善发生口角。英善伤心。.

programme.title: 戏子 The Entertainer - EP 7
programme.desc: Xihao is searching for a drummer when he runs into Zaixun who is playing a second hand drum at a mall. He is attracted by the drumming. Xihao inquires with the boss of the music store about the young man. He visits the young man's university later with the intention to recruit him into the band but discovers that he is a mummy's boy... 锡浩在寻找鼓手时发现了在商场打二手旧鼓的在勋，不禁被那鼓声吸引住了。锡浩向乐器老板打听那位年青人后，便去他就读的大学想游说他加入乐团，却发现他是个妈宝。。。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 49
programme.desc: Ep 67: Xishu discovers the truth behind the switch of the two boys. Disappointed and furious with the entire family for lying to her, Xishu goes home and gives the elders a piece of her mind. Zhixun exclaims that he does not like Xishu. Xishu faints from agitation.Ep 68: Changxu wants Meizhu to return her shares as well as the properties and cars that she bought with the company's funds. Changxu wants Meizhu to be a salaried worker from now on and learn to make a honest living, while Tongxi Ep 67: 熙淑发现孩子们身份的真相后觉得家人太不尊重她，于是气呼呼地回家，责骂家里的长辈。志勋却在这时直言不喜欢熙淑。熙淑打击过大，晕倒。Ep 68: 昌旭考虑把公司交给专业经理管理，要美珠把股份还给她，之前用公司资金购买的房子和车子也必须交出来，只能做个每个月拿薪水的员工，从此学习吃苦。昌旭说彤熙一直在吃苦，送她股份和信用卡，要她学习享受生活。美珠气得跳脚。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 14
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 妇仇者联盟 Avengers' Social Club - EP 8
programme.desc: Ep 9:Xiuqian tells his father that he is not selling his foster grandparents' land. Zhenhui rebukes her husband for making use of Xiuqian.Ep 10:Taoxi and Zhenhui discover that Bai Yingbiao has abused Meishu again. Li Binghao hires help to investigate Zhenhui when he finds her behaving suspiciously. Ep 9:秀谦告知父亲他不会把养祖父母的地卖掉。贞慧训斥老公利用秀谦。Ep 10:桃熙与贞慧发现白英表再次殴打美淑。李秉浩觉得贞慧举动可疑，派人调查她。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 1
programme.desc: Ailin is the mother of a pair of twins. She is normally busy taking care of her mischievous son and daughter. One day, her mischievous daughter accidentally knocks into her mysterious neighbour, Jin Ben, and they start to interact. Jin Ben grows curious about the mother who oddly knows much about his life and he keeps bumping into her whenever he goes out... 爱麟是双胞胎妈妈，平日为了照顾一对淘气的儿女而忙碌。这天，因淘气儿女捣蛋的关系，不小心撞伤了住在隔壁的神秘新邻居金本，开始打交道。金本发现这位妈妈莫名其妙地相当了解他的生活，出门时又经常碰到她，开始对这位邻居感到十分好奇。。。。。。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 2
programme.desc: Jin Ben goes to a wake to investigate the death of Wen Chengzhu, who was the head of the National Security Department. He gets discovered by the NIS deputy director Quan Yingshi. Quan Yingshi recognises Jin Ben as the ex-agent code named "Terrius" and orders his men to hunt down Jin Ben. Jin Ben quickly shakes them off. While handling her husband's funeral arrangements, Ailin receives a call from her neighbour informing her that her twins have disappeared. She is in panics. 金本到灵堂去调查国家保安室室长文成洙的死因时，不慎被国家情报院次长权英实发现了踪迹。权英实认出来金本就是代号为“陶斯”的前特工后命人,即刻加以追捕。金本遭到追踪，迅速逃跑。正当爱麟在办老公的后事时，接到邻居来电告知双胞胎失踪的消息，不禁陷入了恐慌之中。.

programme.title: 加油！向未来 Eureka Moment China - EP 3
programme.desc: "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life gameshow in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. 《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.

programme.title: 有故事的店 Shop Stories - EP 4
programme.desc: A Japanese lady transforms old kimonos into fashion clothes and accessories. A young girl who has mediocre school results and despised by others, rewrites her life story by making cupcakes. Wife sold off their apartment to raise capital for her husband to fulfill his dream in designing porcelain. 日籍移民妇女以旧和服改装成时尚服饰和饰物。成绩不佳而被人看不起，年轻女生决定制作与众不同的杯子蛋糕，改写自己的人生。妻子为完成丈夫的梦想，卖房子筹资金，支持他设计具本地色彩的瓷器。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 5
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, Pepper was on the verge of quitting army until she received an unexpected and encouraging message from Hulk to tell her to press on and win her best recruit award. Feeling more determined, Pepper takes Hulks advice and decides to stay. At the same time, Jian Dong invites Pepper to join him on a paintball session with Hulk and his new girlfriend, Xin Yi. Will this friendly paintball session turn into a nasty confrontation? Pepper嚷嚷着不当兵了，本来真的想要辞职，但后来看到Hulk的简讯，又立刻改变了注意，说要继续当兵下去，拿Best Recruit。众人见她情绪多变，也没办法。在军营里，Sergeant Ong教导她们如何camouflage，做手势和tactical movement，但Pepper每次都乌龙百出惹出了许多笑话。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 2
programme.desc: Polio-stricken Taiwanese Liu Ming was 25 when he was told he would only live up to 30. Instead of giving up on life, he chooses to cherish every moment. Now 60, this radio and TV host has also set up a performing group for the physically disabled to build their confidence and lift their spirits. 来自台湾的刘铭三岁被诊断患上小儿麻痹症，25岁时由于脊椎严重侧弯被诊断只能活到30岁。但他并没自暴自弃，反而更珍惜每一天。如今他已60岁，除了是广播和电视节目主持人，他还成立了一个特别的综艺团，在海内外表演，为身障者建立自信心及散播残而不废的正能量。.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 8
programme.desc: The Taiwanese ba-wan is not like the meatballs you see in your beef noodles or spaghetti bolognaise. The Taiwanese love their meatball so much that they would even eat it chilled. We travel to Changhua to see how this meatball came to be and check out many interesting varieties of Taiwanese ba-wan. (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 120
programme.desc: Ep 87: Everyone at home is relieved when Zhufeng returns safely. Haocai discovers that the porcelain vases owned by Zhufeng are very valuable. He tries to steal them for himself, but is stopped by Xiuzi. Ep 87: 洙峰安全回家，家人们将之前的不欢抛在脑后。浩才拿着洙峰给他的瓷器去鉴定，发现瓷器价格非凡，于是想悄悄地把洙峰所有的瓷器拿去变卖。秀子觉得浩才和爱兰的动作很可疑，阻止他们把瓷器拿走。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 122
programme.desc: Ep 88: Yiyuan does not force Yuzhen to marry her when she is convinced that he does not love her anymore. In the following year, Yuzhen stays by Haixiu's side to help her, but Haixiu does not know what Yuzhen has done for her. Ep 88: 艺苑感觉到宇真已经不爱她，于是没有强迫宇真跟她结婚。接下来的一年，宇真默默在海秀身边帮助她，海秀却不知情。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 15
programme.desc: Ep 19 Lawyer Li Youfan gets anxious when he receives mysterious text messages. The lady murderer, He Zhuan threatened to expose his false accusation against Min Yishuo if he does not help fight her case.Ep 20: Zai Can realizes his colleague, Cui Tantong, is the soldier's brother who killed both his father and Hong Zhu's father. Hong Zhu is injected with a lethal drug by the lady murderer, He Zhuan, and loses consciousness. Ep 19: 李侑凡收到恐吓短信，大感惊慌。女凶手何茱安知道李侑凡伪造明以硕犯罪证据，威胁他要帮她打官司。Ep 20:宰璨发现好搭档崔昙桐竟是害死他与红珠父亲的士兵的哥哥。红珠被何茱安注射药剂昏迷不醒。.

programme.title: 第15届KKBOX风云榜 15th KKBOX Music Awards
programme.desc: "KKBOX Music Awards" is one of the most important music events in Asia! All the awards are generated on the basis of 9 billion streaming and download clicks all over Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Thailand and etc in the year. It shows the trend of pop culture and the influence of music, making "KKBOX Music Awards" not only representing the voice of the audiences, but also acting as an indicator of the market and especially in the Chinese music field. 《KKBOX风云榜》为全亚洲注目的流行音乐盛事，得奖名单由台、港、星、马、日、泰等地全年共110亿次的点播统计所产生，深具广大的民意基础与市场指标性，不仅突显亚洲独有的流行文化趋势与音乐影响力，更为华语乐坛最高荣誉指标之一。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 7
programme.desc: In Bali, Rozz uncovers the island's rugged, cultural beauty - and its lesser-known culinary underbelly. Here, Rozz meets and feasts on a creature of the night, takes part in its food festivals and pushes her taste buds to the limit with strange satay and bee salads. 在“怪食记”中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。 从粘糊糊的沼泽蠕虫到生活美食，Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去菲律宾品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 17
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 发啊！发啊！Huat! (PG ) Huat Ah! Huat Ah! Huat! (HD)
programme.desc: The film tells the story of Ah Huat, a youth who strives for success but never goes against his motto of being honest. Ah Huat reflects the typical Malaysian Chinese who treats everyone with kindness and sincerity. 亚发(阿牛饰演)，出生于单亲家庭，自小患有自闭症，却有异于常人的能力——“龙卷风手"及敏锐的嗅觉。纯真的亚发享受与建平(郑靖辰饰演)、琳琳(练倩卉饰演)、Sup Kambing(曾重凯饰演)及Jeremy(李荣峻饰演)一起玩乐的时光，但是外公(陈建彬饰演)却担心这样下去亚发将无法自己打理生活起居。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 8
programme.desc: A 6.7 magnitude earthquake hit Uruk and Jiang Muyan's medical rushed to the disaster site to provide medical assistance to the survivors. At the same time, Liu Shizhen and Xu Daying were also deployed to Uruk for rescue operations. At this critical moment, everyone gave their best to save others in need. 乌鲁克发生6.7级地震，姜暮研医疗队赶紧到达工程事故现场，对受灾群众进行救治。与此同时，刘时镇、徐大英等人也被紧急派往乌鲁克救灾。此刻大伙都尽全力拯救生命。。。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy - EP 1
programme.desc: Is there really a tumbler that can maintain the temperature of your hot and cold drinks for a long time? Find out how amazing this tumbler is as Jeremy fires a blowtorch to it. 真的有长效保冷以及储热的杯子吗？一起看看它有多神奇.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy - EP 2
programme.desc: Discover how you can kick start a healthy lifestyle with this indoor exercise equipment. 足不出户、不用上健身房也能练身体？到底是怎么样的产品呢？.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy - EP 6
programme.desc: Experience with our hosts how you can make cleaning easier than before with this extraordinary vacuum. 要让家居一尘不染那就得靠这位好帮手——吸尘器！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy - EP 8
programme.desc: Eating healthy goes a long way, watch on to find out how to incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 想补充养分、膳食纤维同时维持身段？不妨喝蔬果饮料当代餐吧！.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters" is a reality cum variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brain power. Wang Feng, Wang Yuhang and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Tao Jingying is invited as the resident guest of the programme. “最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑"邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力.节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、王昱行和鲍雲担任队长，陶晶莹则受邀当常驻嘉宾。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 4
programme.desc: Funtastic is a travelogue with a difference, various artistes in each episode who will bring viewers to their favourite travel destinations. They will introduce unique local specialties and interact with the locals. What's more, the artistes will be put to the test to overcome obstacles along the journey or undertake activities they have never attempted before. 非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 12
programme.desc: Starting from Singapore and travel around the world to explore the original source of ingredients of our food which we are familiar with in our daily life. To explore how these ingredients are affecting the food culture of different countries and Singapore and learn more about the source of origin. 从新加坡出发，以日常生活中随处可及的食材为主轴，找寻世界各地我们最为熟悉的食材种植地及食材加工地。再一探这些食材如何影响着各地甚至是我们的日常菜肴。带观众去看世界的同时，也了解我们熟悉的食材的来源地。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 7
programme.desc: An estimated 400 million take the public bus in China daily. Small change is used as bus fees thus bus stations are known as Small Change Kingdom. How is this huge amount of small change calculated and handled? What if there is substandard small change? Let's find out more with the host in China. 中国公交车系统一天的搭客量估计超过四亿人次，而车费都是以零钞投入的，因此公交车站堪称“零钞王国"。那这些巨量零钞是如何点算和处理的呢？遇到不合规格的零钞又该怎么办？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到中国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 13
programme.desc: In a remote part of Ladakh not even listed on Google Maps, is an unknown village in Leh that is completely devoid of electricity. The remoteness and rugged mountain terrain makes laying conventional power lines impossible. Host Paul Foster is on a special mission to deliver a micro-grid energy system to the people of this village. Carrying a fragile and unwieldy solar panel for days up the unforgiving terrain is a challenge that even the super fit Paul will struggle with. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 6
programme.desc: There is no limit to the type of cases that a plastic surgeon has to deal with - from aesthetic requests to birth defects, and sometimes - even trauma patients. In this episode, we follow two children born with Apert syndrome, and a man who needs urgent surgery after breaking his jaw in a bad fall. 除了应付美容需求的客户，整形外科专家姚国龙医生也得经常为先天性缺陷或创伤病患进行手术。这一集两名亚伯氏症的孩童以及一名因跌断下颌而急需进行手术的男子找上了姚医生。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 1
programme.desc: Ep 1: Wu Chun has talent in wine-tasting and spends two years to prepare herself for a job interview with a wine-making company. Unknown to herself, Wu Chun performs exceptionally well during the interview. Ep 1: 吴春很有品酒的天份，为了成为酿酒公司丰吉堂的正式员工，为面试准备了两年。吴春在面试时表现亮眼，自己却不自觉。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 2
programme.desc: Ep 2: Yonghao looks up Jixiu with the missing person's notice and Wu Chun's childhood photo. Jixiu lies that the girl in the notice is his daughter who passed away twenty years ago. Ep 2: 永浩带着寻人启事和吴春儿时的照片与吉秀见面。吉秀骗说传单上的女孩是他的女儿，二十年前失踪不久后死亡，但孩子的妈不知道，这么多年来还在发传单找孩子。永浩信以为真，以为吴春不是传单中的女孩。.

Yuzhuo loses his police job when he declared he had color blindness on trial. Ep 21:禹卓不得不出庭作证，证明自己在案发现场的楼顶见过两把雨伞。红珠知道禹卓有色盲，预先告诉他雨伞的颜色。Ep22: 不满崔昙桐在庭上指证他，李侑凡把他撞倒。禹卓出庭作证，不得不把隐瞒多年患有色盲秘密透露出来，因此失去警察职位。.

programme.title: My ID is Gangnam Beauty - EP 5
programme.desc: Kang Mi Rae meets Na Hye Sung, CEO of the fragrance brand at the brand's fragrance sampling event. Na Hye Sung is the person who introduced Kang Mi Rae to the love of perfume and was the person who saved her from committing suicide. Na Hye Sung is also the mother of Do Kyung Seok who has not been in contact with since she left the family when Do Kyung Seok was a young boy. Do Kyung Seok is not happy to see his mother at the fragrance sampling event.

programme.title: My ID is Gangnam Beauty - EP 6
programme.desc: Kang Mi Rae learns that Do Kyung Seok was not one of those people in middle school who treated her badly. The laughing he did at the bus stop when she was dancing whilst sitting was finding her dancing feet funny. This was the one and only time he smiled in middle school. The perfume she wore that he pointed out when cleaning the school grounds was a dislike of the scent due to past of his mother sitting in front of the mirror and spraying the perfume like a crazy person.

programme.title: Swap Kerja 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: As a physiotherapist, Atiqah helps to improve the mobility of the aged in Singapore. This does not bode well for Nafeesah who feels that her parents' attention towards her is divided.

programme.title: Demi Cinta - EP 3

programme.title: Janji Sedap - EP 6

programme.title: Tak2ut - EP 5

This way MBI could perhaps disprove this myth and get some publicity as well for MBI. Since they don't have any cases, Dino, Jaz and Aidil agrees to the idea.

programme.title: Duda Pujaan Dara - EP 9

programme.title: J.K.K 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Join in the laughter with stories of the 'Kampung Kalut' residents that are always filled with conflicts. programme.title: Tak Ada Cinta Sepertimu - EP 5
programme.desc: Athea takes care of Hazran who is sick after she heard that Bella is away. Kamarul presents Bella with a diamond necklace after they left his family's house. While Hazran and Athea are watching Qaryum plays soccer, the Principal comes to apologize to Hazran for his rash action that day in accusing Qaryum of stealing the school funds.

programme.title: Swap Kerja 2 - EP 6

In this episode, Azman gets his hands dirty - fixing jeepneys, the most iconic public transport in the Philippines.

programme.title: Setia Menunggumu - EP 10

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 6

Join Suzairhe and Haizad in their medical hub as they discuss remedies that can control eczema.
